meta.title: swn.ski
meta.description: Jakub Sowiński - architekt oprogramowania, programista, nauczyciel programowania, techniczny lider

intro.head: Cześć!
intro.lead: My name is Jakub, I'm a software enthusiast, and I work as a solution architect, software developer, programming teacher, and tech lead. Welcome to my corner of the Internet!
intro.text: If you want to hire me, waste no time, drop me a message. If you yet don't know that you want to hire me, please refer to my resume or read more about my work. Otherwise, enjoy fruits of my labor, such as my projects, talks, articles, courses, or blog posts, or just chill out here with me. Peace!
intro.imgAlt: Jakub Sowiński - architekt oprogramowania, programista, nauczyciel programowania, techniczny lider

architect.head: Architekt oprogramowania
architect.lead: I have 5+ years of experience in solultion and software architecture positions, as well as 3+ years of experience as an university lecturer in software architecture.
architect.text: I can help you design, document, and govern architecture for your software project, be it small or large scale.

lead.architect: Need an architect or consultant for your project?
lead.developer: Have a great, preferably open source project for me to work on?
lead.teacher: Need a software developer or architecture training?
lead.leader: Looking for leader or mentor in IT?

misc.oneAvailableLang: Ta treść jest dostępna tylko w języku
misc.multipleAvailableLangs: Ta treść jest dostępna w językach
